Project: Recipe Keeper


Search for your favorite foods using Recipe Keeper. Powered by the Edamam recipe search API, Recipe Keeper provides you a one stop shop to search for recipies and save the ones you like to your account. The auto-complete search and robust API will provide a better recipe search experince to any food lover.


This project was greated using Reactjs for front-end and Node/Expressjs/MongoDb for back-end


Website: www.therecipekeeper.com

Github: Repository
